item.title: Resources for a Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning
item.description: The Deep Learning (DL) topic is huge! So huge that many people consider it is as a topic separated from the Machine Learning field. I partially agree with that. IMHO, I consider DL more like a very GE...

item.title: Double Descent in Deep Learning
item.description: The U-shape observed when measuring model performance on testset as a function of its flexibility does not hold during training deep learning models. (WHAT!!!?????. Is the world going mad?. Not really.)
